title: World Peace Cafe
description: Situated within the rural setting of Kelmarsh, and within the Nagarjuna Kadampa Buddhist Centre. Large lawn seating area, cafe lounge, patio. Staffed by volunteers. Menu includes toasted panini and sandwiches, salads, soups, veggie lasagne, jacket potatoes, cream teas, cakes and scones. Coffee and a selection of teas. Closes summertime til mid-August.
